text: @realDonaldTrump Trump's ignorance on the Coronavirus us astounding. To make matters worse, he double downs on his stupidity by projecting him making it political onto the Democrats. It's a virus. It doesn't care about politics. And Trump's numbers, surprise, surprise, are way off from reality.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
